none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 23, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
This dude takes electronic dance music (is this house? techno?) and makes it so casually compelling. These tracks in their entirety make up the Esconced EP on Dark Entries, but this teaser cassette takes those jams and turns them into a mini fresh mix, like an abridged version to wet your whistle. It worked. BÉZIER
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-oPmxHdyHMew/U8uMnm5KCwI/AAAAAAAAKaM/5nXbAeJx7qk/s1600/bezier+cover.jpg

seo.title: BÉZIER  - BÉZIER demo - Terminal Escape
